rows.label: qev051509_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ].
You have grown stronger since we last met.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051509_MSG0002
rows.name:
And no surprise, when yours was the strength that
unseated Luxaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051509_MSG0003
rows.name: Thank you for avenging my brothers' deaths.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051509_MSG0004
rows.name:
Rumors are swirling that an unrivaled warrior who won
several previous gauntlets is, in fact, here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051509_MSG0005
rows.name:
But I forbid you from losing to this person!
Go prove that you are Mira's finest, my friend.[ST:wait ]
